name: Axbrolere
culture_notes: Riveric dialect with Coastal Tongues loanwords
Ancestor rites tied to boat-launching and oar-blessing
Diet heavy on smoked riverfish and spiced riverweed
Oarsmen and ritual-suppliers wear simple salt-streak tattoos
constraints: No instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics
Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents or specialized local labor
notes: Population unknown; functions as a small river crossing and ritual provisioning point
Tech baseline near-medieval to early industrial with localized ritual magic
